Package ohos.ai.cv.common

Interface ICvBase

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IBarcodeDetector, IDocRefine, IImageSuperResolution, ITextDetector, ITxtImageSuperResolution

    public interface ICvBase
    Parent interface of basic CV ability interfaces.

    This interface provides common methods for the basic CV abilities.

    Since:
    1

    • Method Detail

      • prepare

        int prepare​()
        Prepares for loading a model.
        Returns:
        Returns the result code indicating whether the operation is successful. For more information, see HwHiAIResultCode.
        Since:
        1

      • getAvailability

        int getAvailability​()
        Obtains the installation status of a plug-in.
        Returns:
        Returns the status code indicating whether the plug-in needs to be downloaded again. For more information, see HwHiAIResultCode.
        Since:
        1

      • loadPlugin

        void loadPlugin​(ILoadPluginCallback loadPluginCallback)
        Downloads a plug-in.
        Parameters:
        loadPluginCallback - Indicates the callback method that triggers download.
        Since:
        1

      • release

        int release​()
        Releases resources.
        Returns:
        Returns 1 if the operation is successful; returns 0 otherwise.
        Since:
        1
